document.full_text: u.s. safety regulators have opened preliminary investigations into consumer complaints about vehicles made by nissan motor co ltd, chrysler llc and general motors co that could affect more than 700,000 cars.
document.title: u.s. probes reports of nissan, chrysler, gm defects
lines_and_colors: u.s. safety regulators have opened preliminary investigations into consumer complaints about vehicles made by nissan motor co ltd, chrysler llc and general motors co that could affect more than 700,000 cars.
